trans-unit.source: ‘full’ - the content will be compressed with some additional rules.
trans-unit.target: ‘full’ - the content will be compressed with some additional rules.

trans-unit.source: ‘full-encode’ - only available for javascript
trans-unit.target: ‘full-encode’ - only available for javascript

trans-unit.source: ‘import’ - the default. normal css import
trans-unit.target: ‘import’ - the default. normal css import

trans-unit.source: ‘inline’ - render the stylesheet inline instead of linking it
trans-unit.target: ‘inline’ - render the stylesheet inline instead of linking it

trans-unit.source: ‘link’ - works better for old browsers and is needed for alternate
trans-unit.target: ‘link’ - works better for old browsers and is needed for alternate

trans-unit.source: ‘none’ - the original content will not be changed
trans-unit.target: ‘none’ - the original content will not be changed

trans-unit.source: ‘safe’ - the content will be compressed in a way which should be safe
trans-unit.target: ‘safe’ - the content will be compressed in a way which should be safe

trans-unit.source: ‘safe-encode’ - only available for javascript
trans-unit.target: ‘safe-encode’ - only available for javascript

trans-unit.source: 0.6 and earlier
trans-unit.target: 0.6和更早

trans-unit.source: A registry for linked Stylesheet and Javascript files.
trans-unit.target: 一个链接样式表和Javascript文件的注册表。

trans-unit.source: Add MANIFEST.in. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: 添加 MANIFEST.in.[WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Add Python 2 / 3 compatibility. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 增加Python 2/3的兼容性。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Add an option ‘applyPrefix’ to stylesheets. This can be set in the UI, in the various constructor methods, or as an attribute in a cssregistry.xml file. It defaults to false. It has no effect in debug mode. In non-debug- mode, however, it will parse a stylesheet for ‘url()’ statements that contain relative paths. These will be prefixed with the Plone site path. If the stylesheet id contains a path (e.g. ‘++resource++foo/css/bar.css’) this will be used in the prefix as well. The goal is to make relative paths internal to a resource directory work, even when resource merging is used. Previously, it’d break because resource merging changes the URL. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Add an option ‘applyPrefix’ to stylesheets. This can be set in the UI, in the various constructor methods, or as an attribute in a cssregistry.xml file. It defaults to false. It has no effect in debug mode. In non-debug- mode, however, it will parse a stylesheet for ‘url()’ statements that contain relative paths. These will be prefixed with the Plone site path. If the stylesheet id contains a path (e.g. ‘++resource++foo/css/bar.css’) this will be used in the prefix as well. The goal is to make relative paths internal to a resource directory work, even when resource merging is used. Previously, it’d break because resource merging changes the URL. [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Add bundle concept - a bundle is a string tag against a resource, which can be used to filter resources by theme. Each theme has a list of enabled bundles, managed on the ‘Bundles’ tab in the ZMI (note that this is global). [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Add bundle concept - a bundle is a string tag against a resource, which can be used to filter resources by theme. Each theme has a list of enabled bundles, managed on the ‘Bundles’ tab in the ZMI (note that this is global). [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Add links to stylesheets that exist in your skins paths, by ids; like ‘plone.css’, ‘ploneCustom.css’ etc.
trans-unit.target: Add links to stylesheets that exist in your skins paths, by ids; like ‘plone.css’, ‘ploneCustom.css’ etc.

trans-unit.source: Add patch from jenner to handle updating and removal of resources from GenericSetup profiles. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Ajout d'un patch de jenner pour gérer la mise à jour et la suppression des ressources des profils GenericSetup.[wichert]

trans-unit.source: Add purge support to export/import handlers. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Adicionar suporte de purga aos manipuladores de exportação/importação.[elro]

trans-unit.source: Add some space between up/down and remove links in ZMI [maartenking]
trans-unit.target: 在ZMI中的上/下之间增加一些空格并删除链接[maartenking]

trans-unit.source: Add support for automatic grouping mode to the GenericSetup export/import code. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Ajouter le support du mode de regroupement automatique au code d'exportation/importation de GenericSetup.[wichert]

trans-unit.source: Add time element. This is necessary for the generated ids to update on any save, to reflect possible updates in the served content. [malthe]
trans-unit.target: 添加时间元素。这是必要的,因为生成的id在任何保存时都会更新,以反映服务内容的可能更新。[malthe]

trans-unit.source: Added
trans-unit.target: 新增

trans-unit.source: Added ‘/’ to the strings that are filtered out in BaseRegistry.generateId(). This fixes #7048. [davconvent]
trans-unit.target: Added ‘/’ to the strings that are filtered out in BaseRegistry.generateId(). This fixes #7048. [davconvent]

trans-unit.source: Added ‘context’ as an alias for ‘object’ in action expressions. [davisagli, hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added ‘context’ as an alias for ‘object’ in action expressions. [davisagli, hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added BBB imports to make sure the InitializeClass can be imported in Zope versions before 2.12. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Adicionadas as importações BBB para garantir que a InitializeClass possa ser importada em versões Zope antes de 2.12.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Added GenericSetup import/export handlers (to support GS-based Plone 2.5 portal creation) [rafrombrc]
trans-unit.target: Ajout des gestionnaires d'importation/exportation de GenericSetup (pour soutenir la création du portail Plone 2.5 basé sur GS)[rafrombrc].

trans-unit.source: Added a “is merging allowed?” option (“cookable” property) to determine where a resource can be merged (default True). This was added because objects in the ZODB may have variable permissions but be merged together. Whilst the objects are checked at each REQUEST, a new REQUEST won’t actually be made each time because of the cache headers set on merged resources. If this worries you, the simplest solution is not to merge such resources, hence this option. [dom]
trans-unit.target: Added a “is merging allowed?” option (“cookable” property) to determine where a resource can be merged (default True). This was added because objects in the ZODB may have variable permissions but be merged together. Whilst the objects are checked at each REQUEST, a new REQUEST won’t actually be made each time because of the cache headers set on merged resources. If this worries you, the simplest solution is not to merge such resources, hence this option. [dom]

trans-unit.source: Added a new automatic grouping mode feature. It is turned off by default. When enabled the resources will first be sorted into groups with the same merging-relevant settings and after that merged. In the groups the order of the resources in the registries will be preserved. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Ajout d'une nouvelle fonction de mode de regroupement automatique.Elle est désactivée par défaut.Lorsqu'elle est activée,les ressources sont d'abord triées en groupes avec les mêmes paramètres pertinents pour la fusion et ensuite fusionnées.Dans les groupes,l'ordre des ressources dans les registres sera conservé.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added a simple readme with basic documentation. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 添加了一个简单的readme和基本文档。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Added better labels and a short explanation to the debugmode-checkbox in the forms. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: Ajout de meilleures étiquettes et d'une brève explication de la case à cocher "debugmode-checkbox" dans les formulaires.[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Added bugfix for handling disabled items when cooking stylesheets. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 添加了处理烹饪样式表中禁用项目的bug修正。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added checkbox to configure cacheability of resources. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Ajout d'une case à cocher pour configurer la possibilité de mise en cache des ressources.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added compression for CSS and Javascript resources. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Ajout d'une compression pour les ressources CSS et Javascript.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added debugmode where scripts are not concatenated. This will let things like the javascript console point to the right line-number. And makes it easier to develop, because there is no caching of the scripts. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 增加了脚本不连贯的debugmode。这将让像javascript控制台这样的东西指向正确的行号。并且使开发更容易,因为没有脚本的缓存。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added getResource function. This allows to change properties of each resource. After that, a call to cookResources is needed. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 增加了getResource函数。这允许更改每个资源的属性。之后,需要调用cookResources。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added getResourceIds function. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 添加了getResourceIds函数。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added javascript “full” compression, which achieves higher compression ratios by doing variable name packing based on the rules from Dean Edwards packer: http://dean.edwards.name/packer/usage/ [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Added javascript “full” compression, which achieves higher compression ratios by doing variable name packing based on the rules from Dean Edwards packer: http://dean.edwards.name/packer/usage/ [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added keyword encoding for javascript. This greatly reduces the file size of javascript files, but adds a small performance hit on the client for the decoding. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Ajout d'un encodage de mots-clés pour le javascript.Cela réduit considérablement la taille des fichiers javascript,mais ajoute un petit coup de performance sur le client pour le décodage.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added license/copyright notice to composite files (neccesary for including for third party stuff). [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 为合成文件添加了许可/版权声明(对于包含第三方的东西是必要的)。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Added migration script for old instances. Just create a external method with id ‘migrate_resourceregistries’, Module Name ‘ResourceRegistries.migrate’ and Function Name ‘migrate’ and click on the ‘Test’ tab. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Added migration script for old instances. Just create a external method with id ‘migrate_resourceregistries’, Module Name ‘ResourceRegistries.migrate’ and Function Name ‘migrate’ and click on the ‘Test’ tab. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added missing InitializeClass call for BaseRegistryTool. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Acrescentada a chamada em falta do InitializeClass para o BaseRegistryTool.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Added missing arguments in resource adding functions. [jenner, fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Ajout des arguments manquants dans les fonctions d'ajout de ressources.[jenner,fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added missing enabled property handling to updateScript. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Ajout de la gestion des propriétés activées manquantes pour mettre à jour le script.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added new debugmode where stylesheets are not concatenated. This will let things like the DOM inspector in Mozilla point to the right line-number. [ldr] [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 增加了新的debugmode,在样式表不连贯的情况下。这将让Mozilla的DOM检查器等东西指向正确的行号。[ldr][elvix]

trans-unit.source: Added option to have a conditional comment attached to a given resource. Currently the UI only supports this behavior with the CSS and JavaScript Registries, but the underpinnings for the KSS registry is in place. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/5521 [dunlapm, fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Added option to have a conditional comment attached to a given resource. Currently the UI only supports this behavior with the CSS and JavaScript Registries, but the underpinnings for the KSS registry is in place. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/5521 [dunlapm, fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added portal_kss as registry for kss files. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Ajout de portal_kss comme registre pour les fichiers kss.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added renameResource function with tests. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 添加了带有测试的renameResource函数。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added support for OFS.Image.File-objects using OFS.Image.PData This fixes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/12479 [datakurre]
trans-unit.target: Added support for OFS.Image.File-objects using OFS.Image.PData This fixes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/12479 [datakurre]

trans-unit.source: Added test for context dependancy to inline css rendering. [dom]
trans-unit.target: 为内联css渲染添加了上下文依赖性测试。[dom]

trans-unit.source: Added tests for attributes on stylesheets. About time. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 增加了对样式表属性的测试。是时候了。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Added theme-parameter for getResourceContent for JavaScriptRegistry. Even if it is unused it now allows the same arguments as the BaseRegistry [tom_gross]
trans-unit.target: 为JavaScriptRegistry的getResourceContent添加了主题参数。即使没有使用,现在也允许使用与BaseRegistry[tom_gross]相同的参数。

trans-unit.source: Added title for alternate stylesheets. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 添加了备选样式表的标题。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added to Plone 2.1 migrations, added installation of the default Plone javascripts and stylesheets. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 添加到Plone 2.1的迁移中,增加了Plone默认的javascript和样式表的安装。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Additionally encodes keywords. This heavily compresses the javascript, but it needs to be decoded on the fly in the browser on each load. Depending on the size of the scripts this could lead to timeouts in Firefox. Use with special care!
trans-unit.target: 另外对关键字进行编码。这严重压缩了javascript,但每次加载时都需要在浏览器中即时解码。根据脚本的大小,这可能会导致Firefox中的超时。请特别注意使用

trans-unit.source: Adjusted tests to match new content-type for JavaScript in Zope 2.12.7+. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Testes ajustados para corresponder ao novo tipo de conteúdo para JavaScript em Zope 2.12.7+.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Allow setting of debug mode in registries through Generic Setup profiles. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8712 [dunlapm]
trans-unit.target: Allow setting of debug mode in registries through Generic Setup profiles. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8712 [dunlapm]

trans-unit.source: Allow users to add resources starting with ‘//’, the proper way to link to external resources when serving over http and https. This makes it much easier to manage content on CDNs. [eleddy]
trans-unit.target: Allow users to add resources starting with ‘//’, the proper way to link to external resources when serving over http and https. This makes it much easier to manage content on CDNs. [eleddy]

trans-unit.source: Apply a marker interface ICookedFile to the files created on the fly for cooked/concatenated resources returned by ResourceRegistries. This makes it easier to detect these for caching purposes and treat them differently to in-ZODB files, which may also be instances of OFS.Image.File. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Aplicar um marcador de interface ICookedFile aos ficheiros criados na mosca para recursos cozinhados/concatenuados devolvidos pelos ResourceRegistries.Isto facilita a sua detecção para fins de cache e trata-os de forma diferente dos ficheiros in-ZODB,que também podem ser instâncias do OFS.Image.File.[optilude]

trans-unit.source: Apply magic id to all resources when not in debug mode, so invalidation works. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Appliquez l'identifiant magique à toutes les ressources lorsqu'elles ne sont pas en mode de débogage,afin que l'invalidation fonctionne.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Automatically set the registries into development mode if Zope itself runs in development mode. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Colocar automaticamente os registos em modo de desenvolvimento se o próprio Zope funcionar em modo de desenvolvimento.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Avoid dependency on the zope.app.zapi package. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Evite a dependência do pacote zope.app.zapi.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Avoid deprecation warnings under Zope 2.13. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 避免Zope 2.13下的废弃警告。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Avoid recursive call of _migrateCookedResouces method in BaseTool which prevented the old concatenated resource storage from beeing migrated. The problem emerged when migrating from Plone 4.2 to 4.3. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 避免BaseTool中_migrateCookedResouces方法的递归调用,防止旧的并发资源存储被迁移。这个问题是在从Plone 4.2迁移到4.3时出现的。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Backported several fixes from 1.3.1: [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: A repris plusieurs correctifs de la version 1.3.1:[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix fixing ZMI form for CSSRegistry. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 修正CSSRegistry的ZMI表单的Bug。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Bugfix for #9849. Incomplete caching. [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: Correcção de erros para #9849.Caching Incompleto.[do3cc]

trans-unit.source: Change BaseRegistryTool.deferredGetContent method to use OFS.File.update_data instead of OFS.File.manage_upload. The manage_upload method is a “ZMI” API. By calling manage_upload an ObjectModifiedEvent would be generated for every resource served from the registry. Let’s do less work. [runyaga]
trans-unit.target: Change BaseRegistryTool.deferredGetContent method to use OFS.File.update_data instead of OFS.File.manage_upload. The manage_upload method is a “ZMI” API. By calling manage_upload an ObjectModifiedEvent would be generated for every resource served from the registry. Let’s do less work. [runyaga]

trans-unit.source: Change the fix for #7522 made in 1.4.3. For inline resources we pass Unicode down into the page templates. The TAL machinery expects to get Unicode and not encoded strings. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Alterar a correcção para #7522 feita em 1.4.3.Para os recursos em linha,passamos Unicode para os modelos de página.A maquinaria TAL espera obter Unicode e não cordas codificadas.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Changed default values for resources to more sensible values. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Mudou os valores por defeito dos recursos para valores mais sensatos.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Changed deprecated getSiteEncoding to hardcoded
trans-unit.target: 将废弃的getSiteEncoding改为硬编码。

trans-unit.source: Changed the development mode to be a non-persistent setting. By default it follows the Zope development mode (bin/instance fg vs. bin/instance console). The setting can be changed during process runtime. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Alterou o modo de desenvolvimento para ser um cenário não-persistente.Por defeito,segue o modo de desenvolvimento Zope (bin/instance fg vs.bin/instance console).A configuração pode ser alterada durante o tempo de execução do processo.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Changed the exportimport handlers to only cook the resources once at the end and not after each new resource has been added. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Modification des gestionnaires d'export-import pour ne cuire les ressources qu'une seule fois à la fin et non après l'ajout de chaque nouvelle ressource.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Changed the order elements are added to the JSRegistry. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 改变了JSRegistry中添加元素的顺序。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Changed the order of CSS/JS rendering, CSS now renders first to allow the browser to get it as soon as possible, to avoid the “flash of unstyled content” [limi]
trans-unit.target: Changed the order of CSS/JS rendering, CSS now renders first to allow the browser to get it as soon as possible, to avoid the “flash of unstyled content” [limi]

trans-unit.source: Changed the registries moveResourceAfter and moveResourceBefore methods to gracefully handle missing destination ids. This is useful for GenericSetup upgrade steps to work even if the resources specified in “insert-after” or “insert-before” do not exist. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Changed the registries moveResourceAfter and moveResourceBefore methods to gracefully handle missing destination ids. This is useful for GenericSetup upgrade steps to work even if the resources specified in “insert-after” or “insert-before” do not exist. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Check existance of stylesheets and javascripts before registering. This fixes reinstallation. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 注册前检查样式表和javascript的存在。这将修复重新安装的问题。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up forms. Better alignment. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 清理了表格。更好的调整。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up imports and whitespaces. Code standardization and small improvements. Fixed ZMI templates XHTML markup. [deo]
trans-unit.target: 清理了导入和空白处。代码标准化和小幅改进。修正了 ZMI 模板的 XHTML 标记。[deo]

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up some old charset related fallback code. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Limpou um antigo código de fallback relacionado com o charset.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up testing framework and made all tests run properly. [fschulze, hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Il a nettoyé le cadre des tests et a fait en sorte que tous les tests se déroulent correctement.[fschulze,hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Comment out views from old resource registry so it does not render them on Plone 5. Meanwhile we don’t remove the product. It is planned to be removed on Plone 5.1. [bloodbare]
trans-unit.target: Comment out views from old resource registry so it does not render them on Plone 5. Meanwhile we don’t remove the product. It is planned to be removed on Plone 5.1. [bloodbare]

trans-unit.source: Content-Type
trans-unit.target: 内容类型

trans-unit.source: Cook resources after GS profile import. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Ressources de cuisine après importation du profil GS.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Credits
trans-unit.target: 学分

trans-unit.source: Declare ‘screen’ to be the default for the media attribute instead of None. It is the most commonly used one in Plone’s own themes. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Declare ‘screen’ to be the default for the media attribute instead of None. It is the most commonly used one in Plone’s own themes. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Declare package dependencies, fixed deprecation warnings for use of Globals and changed error raising to be forward compatible. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Declare dependências de pacotes,avisos de depreciação fixos para utilização de Globais e alteração de erro levantado para ser compatível com o encaminhamento.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Designed and built first version of the CSSregistry. [HammerToe, elvix]
trans-unit.target: 设计并建立了第一个版本的CSSregistry。[HammerToe,elvix]

trans-unit.source: Detect when CSS configuration will cause them to be marked as alternate by browsers and warn the user. [MatthewWilkes]
trans-unit.target: 检测何时CSS配置会导致它们被浏览器标记为交替,并警告用户。[MatthewWilkes]

trans-unit.source: Do not install default CSS and JS on upgrade, only on initial installation. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: N'installez pas les CSS et JS par défaut lors de la mise à niveau,mais uniquement lors de l'installation initiale.[wichert]

trans-unit.source: Do not try to export the
trans-unit.target: Não tente exportar o

trans-unit.source: Don’t break if the site doesn’t have a portal_kss registry. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t break if the site doesn’t have a portal_kss registry. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Don’t filter resources in merged overview in ZMI. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Don’t filter resources in merged overview in ZMI. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Don’t remove conditional compile instructions for IE from javascripts. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Don’t remove conditional compile instructions for IE from javascripts. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Don’t try to traverse to remote objects starting with ‘//’, triggered from plone.css [eleddy]
trans-unit.target: Don’t try to traverse to remote objects starting with ‘//’, triggered from plone.css [eleddy]

trans-unit.source: Don’t wrap None in aquisition wrapper if resource is not found. [tesdal]
trans-unit.target: Don’t wrap None in aquisition wrapper if resource is not found. [tesdal]

trans-unit.source: Eggified into Products.ResourceRegistries.
trans-unit.target: 蛋化为Products.ResourceRegistries。

trans-unit.source: Enable compression to safe bandwidth and download time
trans-unit.target: 启用压缩以保证带宽和下载时间。

trans-unit.source: Enable condition checking on stylesheets. Great for variable look-and-feel for groups/roles/folders/departments/content-types/etc
trans-unit.target: 启用样式表的条件检查。对于组/角色/文件夹/部门/内容类型等的可变外观和感觉来说,是一个很好的选择。

trans-unit.source: Enable developers to activate/deactivate their styles in a simpler way
trans-unit.target: 使开发者能够以更简单的方式激活/停用他们的风格。

trans-unit.source: Enable inline dynamic stylesheets. For those style rules that should vary for each request. Mainly used for things like header-bar- backgroundimages, department colors etc.
trans-unit.target: 启用内联动态样式表。对于那些应该为每个请求而变化的样式规则。主要用于像头条-背景图片,部门颜色等。

trans-unit.source: Enable more componentialization of the stylesheets provided with Plone (and other products) without having to increase the number of http requests for a Plone page.
trans-unit.target: 使Plone(和其他产品)提供的样式表更加组件化,而不必增加Plone页面的http请求数量。

trans-unit.source: Enable product authors to register stylesheets with their product installers without having to resort to override either header.pt or ploneCustom.css creating potential conflicts with other products.
trans-unit.target: 使产品作者能够在他们的产品安装程序中注册样式表,而不需要覆盖header.pt或ploneCustom.css,从而与其他产品产生潜在的冲突。

trans-unit.source: Enable use of z3 / Five resources. [ree]
trans-unit.target: Permettre l'utilisation des ressources z3/five.[ree]

trans-unit.source: Encode inline resources using the site encoding. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7522 [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Encode inline resources using the site encoding. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7522 [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Ensure that resources can be removed in xml. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 确保资源可以在xml中删除。[Maurits]

trans-unit.source: Extended the GenericSetup import step to support positioning of resources: the ‘position-before’ and ‘position-after’ attributes cause the resource to be positioned before or after resource named in the attribute. ‘position-top’ and ‘position-bottom’ move a resource to the top or bottom. [mj]
trans-unit.target: Extended the GenericSetup import step to support positioning of resources: the ‘position-before’ and ‘position-after’ attributes cause the resource to be positioned before or after resource named in the attribute. ‘position-top’ and ‘position-bottom’ move a resource to the top or bottom. [mj]

trans-unit.source: Fix for bug #4392, where merging FSfiles could mess up http-status headers and cause weird hanging in browsers. [plonista, fschulze, elvix]
trans-unit.target: 修正错误#4392,合并FSfiles可能会弄乱http-status头文件,并导致浏览器中的奇怪挂起。[plonista,fschulze,elvix]

trans-unit.source: Fix handling of the purge attribute on import. [rossp]
trans-unit.target: 修正导入时对purge属性的处理。[rossp]

trans-unit.source: Fix import from Globals that is removed in Zope4. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 修正在Zope4中被删除的从Globals导入。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fix order of javascripts, the topmost in the management screen also needs to be the topmost in the resulting source. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 修正javascripts的顺序,管理界面中最上面的也需要是生成的源码中最上面的。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fix relative import for py3 [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 修正py3的相对导入 [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fix test failure under Plone 4.2. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 修正Plone 4.2下的测试失败。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fix the authenticated checkbox on the kss form. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Fixar a caixa de verificação autenticada no formulário kss.[elro].

trans-unit.source: Fixed “AttributeError: ‘FileResourceXX’ object has no attribute ‘POST’ when displaying inline resources when using a POST request. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/ticket/8998 [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Fixed “AttributeError: ‘FileResourceXX’ object has no attribute ‘POST’ when displaying inline resources when using a POST request. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/ticket/8998 [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed JS packer to be a little less greedy about protecting regular expressions. This fixes #8790. [dunlapm]
trans-unit.target: Fixou o embalador JS para ser um pouco menos ganancioso na protecção de expressões regulares.Isto fixa o número 8790.[dunlapm]

trans-unit.source: Fixed JSRegistry for Plone < 2.1 where plone_utils.getSiteEncoding is not available. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Fixed JSRegistry for Plone < 2.1 where plone_utils.getSiteEncoding is not available. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed ZMI screens to render for resources containing query strings in their ids, like found in the plone.session refresh support. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 修正了ZMI屏幕,使其能够渲染包含查询字符串的资源,就像在plone.session刷新支持中发现的那样。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed cooking of resources to ensure that uncookable resources are not merged. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Cuisson fixe des ressources pour éviter la fusion des ressources non cuites.[elro]

trans-unit.source: Fixed cooking of stylesheets so that composite stylesheets get correct media settings. Thanks a lot to Denis Mishunoff[spliter] for discovery, investigation and suggested fix [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 修正了样式表的烹饪问题,使合成样式表得到正确的媒体设置。非常感谢 Denis Mishunoff[spliter]的发现、调查和建议的修正[elvix]。

trans-unit.source: Fixed encoding of javascripts. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 修正了javascripts的编码。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed error when content is unicode. [rocky]
trans-unit.target: Correction d'une erreur lorsque le contenu est unicode.[rocky]

trans-unit.source: Fixed error where non-traversable resources could be registered. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8153 [dunlapm]
trans-unit.target: Fixed error where non-traversable resources could be registered. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8153 [dunlapm]

trans-unit.source: Fixed error with GS Export/Import. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9154 [dunlapm]
trans-unit.target: Fixed error with GS Export/Import. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9154 [dunlapm]

trans-unit.source: Fixed error with inline z3resources not being able to handle a POST request. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8998 [dunlapm]
trans-unit.target: Fixed error with inline z3resources not being able to handle a POST request. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8998 [dunlapm]

trans-unit.source: Fixed error with the conditional comment being lost when adding a new Resource when adding a new entry to the JS or CSS registries. [dunlapm]
trans-unit.target: Erro corrigido com a perda do comentário condicional ao acrescentar um novo Recurso ao acrescentar uma nova entrada aos registos do JS ou do CSS.[dunlapm]

trans-unit.source: Fixed function of enabled checkbox when adding css/javascript from ZMI. Added title field to the ‘add stylesheet’ part in the ZMI. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Fixed function of enabled checkbox when adding css/javascript from ZMI. Added title field to the ‘add stylesheet’ part in the ZMI. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed imports on Plone 5. [1letter] (#27)
trans-unit.target: 修正了Plone 5上的导入。[1letter](#27)

trans-unit.source: Fixed order of oneline and multiline comment removal in javascript packer. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Correction de l'ordre de suppression des commentaires en ligne et multilignes dans le packer javascript.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed potential Acquisition problems in viewlets. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 修正了viewlet中潜在的获取问题。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed reinstall bug due to improper resource id lookup. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: 修正了由于资源id查找不正确导致的重装错误。[ALECM]

trans-unit.source: Fixed reordering of resources in ZMI when javascript is enabled. [fschulze, jenner]
trans-unit.target: 修正了启用javascript时ZMI中资源的重新排序问题。[fschulze,jenner]

trans-unit.source: Fixed reordering of resources with javascript. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 用javascript修正了资源的重新排序。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed setDebugMode to recook resources after being changed. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Correction de setDebugMode pour recréer les ressources après leur modification.[elro]

trans-unit.source: Fixed setting of cache headers when the registry is associated with a RAMCache. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Correction du paramétrage des en-têtes de cache lorsque le registre est associé à un RAMCache.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed several issues in ‘full’ compression. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Fixed several issues in ‘full’ compression. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed some security declarations. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 修正了一些安全声明。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed some spurious test failures for Expires being off by minus one second. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 修正了一些虚假的测试失败,因为过期时间偏离了负一秒。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed spurious test failures for Expires being off by one second. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 修正了过期时间偏离一秒的虚假测试失败。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed string protection for strings which mix single and double quotes. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Protection des cordes fixes pour les cordes qui mélangent des guillemets simples et doubles.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed string replacement during packing when several resources got packed in different threads at once, which resulted in exchanged strings. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Remplacement des cordes fixes pendant l'emballage lorsque plusieurs ressources ont été emballées dans différents fils à la fois,ce qui a entraîné un échange de cordes.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed submitting changes in ZMI for stylesheets on IE. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 修正了在IE上提交ZMI中对样式表的修改。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed test failures caused by changes in Zope 2.10. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Correction des échecs aux tests causés par les modifications de Zope 2.10.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed tests for unauthorized to accept a 401 as an unauthorized error. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Correction des tests permettant d'accepter un 401 comme une erreur non autorisée.[elro]

trans-unit.source: Fixed traversal of security restricted resources. [jenner, alecm, fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Traversée fixe des ressources à sécurité restreinte.[jenner,alecm,fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed typo in the migration external method which lead to portal_javascripts not being migrated. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 修正了迁移外部方法中的错别字,导致portal_javascripts没有被迁移。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed typo in update process of authenticated resources. Fixes #9599 [naro]
trans-unit.target: Corrigido erro tipográfico no processo de actualização dos recursos autenticados.Correcções #9599 [naro]

trans-unit.source: Fixed typo which prevented position-after/insert-after in GS profiles to work. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Correction d'une erreur de frappe qui empêchait le positionnement après/insertion après dans les profils GS de fonctionner.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixed validation warning about multiple comments when rendering resources inline. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Correction d'un avertissement de validation concernant les commentaires multiples lors de la mise en ligne des ressources.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: 修复。

trans-unit.source: Florian Schulze – Independent
trans-unit.target: Florian Schulze – Independent

trans-unit.source: For compatibility with GenericSetup conventions, the import steps now support ‘insert-before’ and ‘insert-after’ as aliases for ‘position-before’ and ‘position-after’, while ‘insert-top’ and ‘insert-bottom’ are aliases for ‘position-top’ and ‘position-bottom’, respectively. [mj]
trans-unit.target: For compatibility with GenericSetup conventions, the import steps now support ‘insert-before’ and ‘insert-after’ as aliases for ‘position-before’ and ‘position-after’, while ‘insert-top’ and ‘insert-bottom’ are aliases for ‘position-top’ and ‘position-bottom’, respectively. [mj]

trans-unit.source: For css all comments and most newlines are removed, this may break special browser hacks, so use with care. For javascript this encodes variables with special prefixes according to the rules described here (Special Characters): http://dean.edwards.name/packer/usage/ The source code needs to be written according to those rules, otherwise it’s more than likely that it will break.
trans-unit.target: For css all comments and most newlines are removed, this may break special browser hacks, so use with care. For javascript this encodes variables with special prefixes according to the rules described here (Special Characters): http://dean.edwards.name/packer/usage/ The source code needs to be written according to those rules, otherwise it’s more than likely that it will break.

trans-unit.source: Geir Baekholt – Jarn AS
trans-unit.target: Geir Baekholt – Jarn AS

trans-unit.source: Get the tests working again under Plone 5 and make sure we handle zope.app.publisher file resources correctly under repoze.zope2. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Colocar os testes a funcionar novamente sob Plone 5 e certificar-se de que lidamos correctamente com os recursos do ficheiro zope.app.publisher sob repoze.zope2.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Handle a missing portal_kss tool gracefully in the kineticstylesheets viewlet. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Manusear graciosamente uma ferramenta de portal_kss em falta no visualizador de cinética de folhas de cinética.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Handle cache settings in http headers for served files. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 在http头中处理服务文件的缓存设置。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Handle http headers for inline scripts and stylesheets. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 处理内联脚本和样式表的http头。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: If several stylesheets listed directly after each other in the registry have the same parameters and expression, they will be concatenated into a larger, composite, stylesheet on rendering. - This can be useful for splitting stylesheets into smaller components for overrideing, while preserving cacheability and minimising the number of http-requests to Plone.
trans-unit.target: 如果在注册表中,几个样式表的参数和表达式都相同,那么在渲染时,它们将被连接成一个更大的复合样式表。-这对于将样式表分割成更小的组件进行覆盖是很有用的,同时还可以保留缓存和减少对Plone的http请求数量。
Improved IE conditional compilation protection, it now works in “full” compression. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Improved management UI. [limi, fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 改进管理用户界面。[LIMI,Fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Improved regular expression for strings. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Amélioration de l'expression régulière pour les cordes.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: In Plone 2.1 plone_javascripts.js was removed, fixed tests by using jstest.js from our own skin. [dom]
trans-unit.target: 在Plone 2.1中删除了plone_javascripts.js,通过使用我们自己皮肤中的jstest.js来固定测试。[dom]

trans-unit.source: Include
trans-unit.target: 包括

trans-unit.source: Included fixes from the 1.2 line. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Inclut les corrections de la ligne 1.2.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Invalidate cache when cooking resources if the registry is assigned to a RAMCache or similar cache manager.
trans-unit.target: Invalidez le cache lors de la cuisson des ressources si le registre est attribué à un RAMCache ou à un gestionnaire de cache similaire.

trans-unit.source: Jarn AS
trans-unit.target: Jarn AS

trans-unit.source: Laurence Rowe – Independent
trans-unit.target: Laurence Rowe – Independent

trans-unit.source: Linked stylesheets take some parameters:
trans-unit.target: 链接的样式表需要一些参数。

trans-unit.source: Lots of changes, numerous fixes. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 很多变化,很多修复。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Made GenericSetup importer not fail on repeated imports. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: A fait en sorte que l'importateur GenericSetup n'échoue pas sur des importations répétées.[alecm]

trans-unit.source: Made css “full” packing more aggressive. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Made css “full” packing more aggressive. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Made enabled checkbox work again. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Rendre la case à cocher activée à nouveau opérationnelle.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Made moving of stylesheets and javascripts in ZMI possible without javascript being enabled in the browser. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 使得在ZMI中移动样式表和javascript成为可能,而无需在浏览器中启用javascript。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Made packer.py usable as a standalone commandline tool. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Rendre packer.py utilisable comme un outil de ligne de commande autonome.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Made registries cacheable. This is most useful with the RAMCacheManager. Just associate portal_css and portal_javascripts with the RAMCache. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Rendre les registres cachables.Cela est particulièrement utile avec le RAMCacheManager.Il suffit d'associer portal_css et portal_javascripts au RAMCache.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Made skin aware. This now depends on getCurrentSkinName added in CMF 1.5.5. [elro]
trans-unit.target: 实现了皮肤识别。现在这取决于CMF 1.5.5中添加的getCurrentSkinName。[elro]
Make it possible to change the default bundles for a theme by assigning bundles to ‘(default)’ [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Make sure we intercept all requests for objects, even those already present in the acquisition chain. Override __bobo_traverse__. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 确保我们拦截所有对象的请求,即使是那些已经存在于采集链中的对象。覆盖__bobo_traverse__。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Mark missing or unaccessible ressources in management screens. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Marquez les ressources manquantes ou inaccessibles dans les écrans de gestion.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Marked zope.component as a real dependency of this package. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Marcado zope.component como uma dependência real deste pacote.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Matt Hamilton – Netsight Internet Solutions
trans-unit.target: Matt Hamilton – Netsight Internet Solutions

trans-unit.source: Moved ‘enabled’ checkbox into legend before ‘id’ textbox. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Moved ‘enabled’ checkbox into legend before ‘id’ textbox. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Moved 2.0.5 header.pt to skins/ResourceRegistries_20compatibility and remove ResourceRegistries_20compatibility when Plone != 2.0.x [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 将2.0.5 header.pt移至skins/ResourceRegistries_20compatibility,并删除Plone !=2.0.x时的ResourceRegistries_20compatibility [fschulze]。

trans-unit.source: Moved directory with skin layer for Plone 2.0.5 compatibility to product root, so it doesn’t interfere with Plone 2.1. The version check on install time didn’t seem to be enough. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Moved directory with skin layer for Plone 2.0.5 compatibility to product root, so it doesn’t interfere with Plone 2.1. The version check on install time didn’t seem to be enough. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Netsight Internet Solutions
trans-unit.target: Netsight互联网解决方案

trans-unit.source: No changes since rc1.
trans-unit.target: Pas de changement depuis rc1.

trans-unit.source: Nothing to import.
trans-unit.target: Nada a importar.

trans-unit.source: Now uses restrictedTraverse() rather than getattr() for returning resources, to provide support for resources held within the ZODB. [dom]
trans-unit.target: 现在使用restrictedTraverse()而不是getattr()来返回资源,以提供对ZODB内资源的支持。[dom]

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概述

trans-unit.source: Ported bugfixes from 1.3 line. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Portage des corrections de bogues à partir de la ligne 1.3.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Properly encode the resource id. This fixes moving of resource without JS and removing recources which contain special chars like plus signs. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7482 [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Properly encode the resource id. This fixes moving of resource without JS and removing recources which contain special chars like plus signs. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7482 [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Properly handle redirections from login view; resources used to be erased on authentication redirect for POST action [mihneasim]
trans-unit.target: 妥善处理登录视图的重定向;过去的资源在POST操作的认证重定向时被清除[mihneasim]。

trans-unit.source: Purge old zope2 Interface interfaces for Zope 2.12 compatibility. [elro]
trans-unit.target: 清理旧的zope2接口,兼容Zope 2.12。[elro]

trans-unit.source: Put CDATA start and end markers in a javascript comment. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9128 [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Put CDATA start and end markers in a javascript comment. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9128 [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Raise width of resource-id input fields in ZMI from 30 to 80, so that browser resource ids can be shown as whole. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 将ZMI中资源id输入字段的宽度从30提高到80,这样浏览器的资源id就可以整体显示。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Refactored moving functions, so we have more possibilities. The API reflects the IOrderedContainer one. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 重构了移动函数,所以我们有更多的可能性。API反映了IOrderedContainer的。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Refactored the two registries to use one common base class. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 重构了两个注册表,使用一个共同的基类。[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Registry for managing CSS and JS
trans-unit.target: 管理CSS和JS的注册表

trans-unit.source: Remove tests, since this contains only stubs [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: 删除测试,因为这只包含存根[tomgross]

trans-unit.source: Removed BBB imports and code. We require Zope 2.12 now. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Removido as importações e código BBB.Requeremos o Zope 2.12 agora.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Removed compatibility stuff for Plone version lower than 3.0. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Suppression des problèmes de compatibilité pour les versions de Plone inférieures à 3.0.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Removed duplicate getScripts function definition in tools/JSRegistry.py [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: 删除了工具/JSRegistry.py中重复的getScripts函数定义[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Removed some whitespace in the rendering templates for JS, CSS and KSS to make the source rendering more readable. These are very small and understandable templates, so we’d rather have some noise there than on the front end. [limi]
trans-unit.target: Removed some whitespace in the rendering templates for JS, CSS and KSS to make the source rendering more readable. These are very small and understandable templates, so we’d rather have some noise there than on the front end. [limi]

trans-unit.source: Removed the
trans-unit.target: 删除了

trans-unit.source: Removed the uppermost Save button from the ZMI pages for registries. Clicking this button before the registry page has finished loading could lead to data loss. [dunlapm, fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Removido o botão de Guardar em cima das páginas do ZMI para os registos.Clicar neste botão antes da página de registo ter terminado o carregamento poderia levar à perda de dados.[dunlapm,fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Removing superflous skins directories. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 删除超级皮肤目录。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Renamed ‘TAL condition’ to ‘Condition’ in the forms, as it has nothing to do with TAL at all (it is a CMF/TALES expression) It should include a link to CMF Expressions help [elvix]
trans-unit.target: Renamed ‘TAL condition’ to ‘Condition’ in the forms, as it has nothing to do with TAL at all (it is a CMF/TALES expression) It should include a link to CMF Expressions help [elvix]

trans-unit.source: Renamed config.TOOLNAME to config.CSSTOOLNAME and config.TOOLTYPE to config.CSSTOOLTYPE [batlogg]
trans-unit.target: 将config.TOOLNAME更名为config.CSSTOOLNAME,将config.TOOLTYPE更名为config.CSSTOOLTYPE。

trans-unit.source: Renamed to ResourceRegistries instead of the historical and wrong CSSRegistry. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 重新命名为ResourceRegistries,而不是历史上错误的CSSRegistry。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Replace troublesome HTTP_REFERER redirects, they can lead to infinite redirects on expired session re-login [mihneasim]
trans-unit.target: 替换麻烦的HTTP_REFERER重定向,它们会导致在过期的会话中无限重定向[mihneasim]。

trans-unit.source: Replace usage of getToolByNames with getUtility. [wichert, hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Remplacez l'utilisation de getToolByNames par getUtility.[wichert,hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Resources beginning with “http://” or “https://” are now valid and may be included as resources. Registries will automatically disable merging, caching, compression, and inline rendering of external resources. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8312 [dunlapm, fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Resources beginning with “http://” or “https://” are now valid and may be included as resources. Registries will automatically disable merging, caching, compression, and inline rendering of external resources. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8312 [dunlapm, fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Restructured documentation files. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Ficheiros de documentação reestruturados.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Revert part of r7143: returning NotFound from a API call is never the right thing to do since it makes the publisher show a object-not-found page, hiding the real error. Restore the old behaviour and raise a ValueError instead. This fixes mysterious not-found errors from GenericSetup imports. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: 恢复 r7143 的部分内容:从 API 调用中返回 NotFound 从来都不是正确的做法,因为它使发布者显示了一个对象未找到的页面,隐藏了真正的错误。恢复旧的行为,并引发一个ValueError。这修复了从GenericSetup导入时出现的神秘的not-found错误。[wichert]

trans-unit.source: Reverted fix of tests, because Zope was wrong. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Correction inversée des tests,parce que Zope avait tort.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Separate JSRegistry and CSSRegistry to two tools. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 将JSRegistry和CSSRegistry分离到两个工具中。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Silence the
trans-unit.target: Silencie o

trans-unit.source: Slightly optimized the viewlet manager templates. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Légèrement optimisé les modèles de gestionnaires de viewlets.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Small fixes to UI. [limi]
trans-unit.target: 对用户界面进行了小的修正。[limi]

trans-unit.source: Snowsprint 2005
trans-unit.target: Snowsprint 2005

trans-unit.source: Started HISTORY.txt (somewhat late perhaps, but better than never). [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 开始编写HISTORY.txt(也许有点晚,但总比没有好)。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: Started to use views and viewlet managers. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Début de l'utilisation de vues et de gestionnaires de vues.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Store the cooked expressions as a real persistent expression object, instead of compiling the expression on every view. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 将熟化的表达式存储为一个真正的持久化表达式对象,而不是在每个视图上编译表达式。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Support Z3 template resources (not just file and image resources). [mj]
trans-unit.target: 支持Z3模板资源(不仅仅是文件和图片资源)。[mj]

trans-unit.source: Support merging of resources that return IStreamIterators [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Apoiar a fusão de recursos que devolvem IStreamIterators [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Switched <link rel=”kinetic-stylesheet” type=”text/css” /> to <link rel=”stylesheet” data-rel=”kinetic-stylesheet” type=”text/kss” /> to fix HTML5 validation. References http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11300 [spliter]
trans-unit.target: Switched <link rel=”kinetic-stylesheet” type=”text/css” /> to <link rel=”stylesheet” data-rel=”kinetic-stylesheet” type=”text/kss” /> to fix HTML5 validation. References http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11300 [spliter]

trans-unit.source: Switched back to getToolByName. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Il est retourné à getToolByName.[wichert]

trans-unit.source: The CSSRegistry and JSRegistry are configured through the ZMI. They can be found in the ZMI of your plonesite as ‘portal_css’ and ‘portal_javascript’.
trans-unit.target: The CSSRegistry and JSRegistry are configured through the ZMI. They can be found in the ZMI of your plonesite as ‘portal_css’ and ‘portal_javascript’.

trans-unit.source: This fixes an issue with external caches where resources for different content would sometimes get assigned the same resource id (due to the previous implementation using a random integer), making it impossible to cache a resource correctly without additional information. [malthe]
trans-unit.target: 这修复了外部缓存的一个问题,在这个问题上,不同内容的资源有时会被分配到相同的资源id(由于之前的实现使用随机整数),使得在没有额外信息的情况下无法正确缓存资源。[malthe]

trans-unit.source: This registry is mainly aimed at solving the following usecases:
trans-unit.target: 该登记处主要是为了解决以下用例。

trans-unit.source: This tool was started at the excellent SnowSprint 2005 - Organised by Telesis in the Austrian Alps. Thanks, Jodok! :)
trans-unit.target: 这个工具是在奥地利阿尔卑斯山由Telesis组织的优秀的SnowSprint 2005上开始的。谢谢你,Jodok! :)

trans-unit.source: Update license to GPL version 2 only. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 只更新许可证到GPL 2版本。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Upgraded JSRegistry to have a more proper ZMI form, now with reordering support. [elvix]
trans-unit.target: 升级了JSRegistry,使其具有更合适的ZMI形式,现在支持重新排序。[elvix]

trans-unit.source: as a new option to all resources. If a resource is marked this way, it will only be shown for authenticated users. This makes the most common use-case of restricting resources to logged-in users easier and allows to optimize the internal API for speed for this use-case. An expression on a resource is ignored if the authenticated flag is set. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: como uma nova opção para todos os recursos.Se um recurso for marcado desta forma,só será mostrado para utilizadores autenticados.Isto facilita o caso de utilização mais comum de restringir os recursos a utilizadores com sessão iniciada e permite optimizar a API interna para uma maior velocidade para este caso de utilização.Uma expressão sobre um recurso é ignorada se a bandeira autenticada for definida.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: as an attribute when exporting ResourceRegistries. [saily]
trans-unit.target: 作为导出资源注册表时的一个属性。[Saily]

trans-unit.source: authenticated
trans-unit.target: 验证的

trans-unit.source: authenticated – Restrict the resource to authenticated users. If this is set, the expression is not evaluated.
trans-unit.target: authenticated – Restrict the resource to authenticated users. If this is set, the expression is not evaluated.

trans-unit.source: bugfix: do not convert URIs such as url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,PD94bWwgdmVyc2lv) to absolute urls see https://github.com/plone/Products.ResourceRegistries/pull/16 [cillianderoiste]
trans-unit.target: bugfix: do not convert URIs such as url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,PD94bWwgdmVyc2lv) to absolute urls see https://github.com/plone/Products.ResourceRegistries/pull/16 [cillianderoiste]

trans-unit.source: bundle – A resource bundle is like a tag, which can be applied to each resource. The default (implicit) bundle is called ‘default’, but other names can be used. Bundles are associated with themes (skins) on the ‘Bundles’ tab in the ZMI. Note that the same association applies to all resource registries, i.e. this is a global setting. Bundles act like a filter - only resources in the bundles listed for the current theme will be included.
trans-unit.target: bundle – A resource bundle is like a tag, which can be applied to each resource. The default (implicit) bundle is called ‘default’, but other names can be used. Bundles are associated with themes (skins) on the ‘Bundles’ tab in the ZMI. Note that the same association applies to all resource registries, i.e. this is a global setting. Bundles act like a filter - only resources in the bundles listed for the current theme will be included.

trans-unit.source: compression – Whether and how much the resource should be compressed:
trans-unit.target: compression – Whether and how much the resource should be compressed:

trans-unit.source: conditionalcomment – A small string to be included in a conditional comment around the resource. For example, entering simply ‘IE’ in the field will result in a conditional comment of: <!–[if IE]>…<![endif]–> This behavior is currently only enabled for the CSS Registry. For more information see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms537512.aspx
trans-unit.target: conditionalcomment – A small string to be included in a conditional comment around the resource. For example, entering simply ‘IE’ in the field will result in a conditional comment of: <!–[if IE]>…<![endif]–> This behavior is currently only enabled for the CSS Registry. For more information see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms537512.aspx
